db.description:
Overall purpose of the job: The Accountant Executive is responsible for ensuring internal control system designed by Company as well as per rules and regulations of Vietnamese Accounting System are implemented. She / he is also in charge of maintaining books of accounts as per Company’s standard. Key activities: 
1. Maintain accounting records and procedures in line with VAS and IFRS 
2. Manage assets register, control and depreciate fixed assets 
3. Accrue expenses on time and record 
4. Checking inventory weekly, monthly and calculate, analysis COGS 
5. The monthly inventory taking of Food & Beverage are done properly and to join directly with parties per Store to make recipe costing. 
6. And the quarter inventory taking of tools and assets, and join directly with parties per Store, comparing and analyzing variances. 
7. To supervise and control subordinates to resolve their duties in an effective 
8. To transfer data of stock on POS into Fast Accounting system. 
9. Prepare the VAT report, PIT report, CIT report to send The Tax Authorities at the end of each month, each quarter, yearly and in time 
10. Prepare and review financial statements always ensuring quality, accuracy and compliance with VAS meet deadline 
11. Prepare monthly, quarterly and annual trial balance, income statement, balance sheet, and cash flow statement. 
12. Prepare inventory reports and perform costing calculation as well as organize periodic stock takes. 
13. Perform other duties as assigned from time to time.
db.requirement:
- University Degree in Finance and Accounting or related fields 
- Minimum of 3-5 years of work experience,
- Good in written and spoken English 
- Trust worthy, honest, careful, and ethical 
- Able to work independently 
- Good communication skills
